name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a dedicated Senior Analyst Engineer, I leverage my extensive background in AI, Data Analytics, and Decision Intelligence to drive innovative solutions. With 8 years of experience in full-stack development, I excel in crafting high-performance applications using a robust tech stack that includes **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, **Flutter**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, **Django**, and deep cloud expertise in **Azure** and **AWS**. My ability to integrate AI and ML capabilities facilitates predictive analytics, intelligent automation, and real-time data processing.
I possess in-depth knowledge of Analytics Engineering and AIDelta Engineering, along with hands-on experience in technical analysis and research writing. Additionally, I have a strong record of collaborating with cross-functional teams and enhancing client engagement through effective presentation skills. My passion for mentorship and promoting innovation supports a culture of continuous improvement and knowledge sharing.
